email_text:
Subject: Urgent COVID-19 Relief Assistance Form

Dear [Recipient],

As part of our ongoing efforts to provide support to individuals and businesses affected by the COVID-19 pandemic, we are pleased to inform you that the government has allocated funds for relief assistance.

In order to receive this financial support, we kindly ask you to fill out the attached form with your personal and financial information. This will enable us to process your application quickly and efficiently.

We understand the challenges that many are facing during these difficult times, and we are committed to providing assistance to those in need. Your cooperation in completing this form will allow us to disburse funds to you as soon as possible.

Please be assured that all information provided will be kept confidential and used solely for the purpose of distributing relief assistance. If you have any questions or concerns, do not hesitate to contact us at the number provided below.

Thank you for your attention to this matter, and we look forward to helping you during this challenging period.

Sincerely,

[Government Agency Name]
[Contact Number]
[Attachment: COVID-19 Relief Assistance Form]
